author: Quaker Oats
title: Steel Cut Oats Summer Grain Salad
ingredients: 2 tbsp oil, vegetable
1/2 cup yellow onion, small diced
1 cup zucchini, small dice
1/4 cup baby lima beans, fresh (frozen if not in season)
3 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 cup bell peppers, small diced red/yellow/orange
1/4 cup corn, fresh frozen or canned also work
2 tbsp white wine vinegar; other flavor vinegar could work, such as apple cider, white balsamic, or rice vinegar
Large pinch salt, kosher
1/2 cup fluffy steel cut oats [sub recipe]
Fluffy Steel Cut Oats
1 cup Quaker® Steel Cut Oats - Traditional
1 ⅓ cups water, hot (recommend using a water kettle)
1/2 tsp salt
2 tbsp oil, vegetable
1/2 cup yellow onion, small diced
1 cup zucchini, small dice
1/4 cup baby lima beans, fresh (frozen if not in season)
3 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 cup bell peppers, small diced red/yellow/orange
1/4 cup corn, fresh frozen or canned also work
2 tbsp white wine vinegar; other flavor vinegar could work, such as apple cider, white balsamic, or rice vinegar
Large pinch salt, kosher
1/2 cup fluffy steel cut oats [sub recipe]
Fluffy Steel Cut Oats
1 cup Quaker® Steel Cut Oats - Traditional
1 ⅓ cups water, hot (recommend using a water kettle)
1/2 tsp salt

description: Discover a fun and delicious way to enjoy oats with our easy and delicious Steel Cut Oats Summer Grain Salad recipe made with your favorite Quaker® products.
